text: The clans of the Gershonites obtained thirteen cities from the tribes of Issachar, Asher, and Naphtali, and from the half-tribe of Manasseh in Bashan.
But when Judasâ€™ troops saw the strength of the royal army and the ardor of its forces, they retreated from them.
how then can the things they have produced be gods? They have left frauds and disgrace to their successors.
When it was evening, the boat was far out on the sea and he was alone on shore.
I will show you what someone is like who comes to me, listens to my words, and acts on them.
Amen, amen, I say to you, whoever believes has eternal life.
